page.title: 10CHRISTMAS FESTIVITIES
page.content: At Christmas many people go round the Villages Carol Singing.They collect money for charity. A member of the Round Table Organisation dresses up as Father Christmas and rides around the Villages on a sleigh also collecting money for charity.All the children tell Santa what they would like for Christmas and sometimes he gives the little children a ride on the sleigh. At school we have our own post box in which we can post cards to each other. The school has its own party where we all wear funny hats and play games like "Give Us A Clue" and "hangman". We have a Christmas tea followed by a magician or a Puppet Show.
